@comments.name: Name of Module (MUST BE LOWERCASE AND NOT HAVE SPACES)
@comments.toggleable: If the module can be toggled on and off via the staff panel
@comments.depends: Any modules required to use this module
@comments.softdepends: Any modules not required but suggested to use this module
@comments.files: List of all files in the module. **ONLY JS/TS FILES NOT ASSETS**
